meta.description: Cathay Pacific Business Class Lounge at London Heathrow Airport (LHR), Terminal 3. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Cathay Pacific Business Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: Lounge C in the Central Concourse, near Gate 11.

lounge.description: Welcome to the new Cathay Pacific Business Class Lounge at London Heathrow. Savor a sumptuous meal at The Noodle Bar, offering a selection of world-renowned dishes made-to-order by the chef. Then recharge in one of eight shower suites, providing guests a calm and stress-free environment to unwind before their journey.

reviews.content: Just like the lounges in HKG. Full bar setups.  Plenty of hot food options. Showers nice.  Best of the oneworld options.
This is my favourite oneworld lounge, amazing selection of food, clean and the service is great. The seating is modern and very comfortable.
Wonderful lounge with excellent food and drinks. The noodle bar is exceptionally good and has excellent dim sum as well. Champagne available is also very good indeed. Runway views a bonus.
Excellent. Breakfast had both noodle bar and Western selections, plus good coffee. Comfortable chairs. Lots of outlets.

So glad we stopped here. Comfy chairs everywhere, quiet & relaxing. Delicious noodles & dim sum. Great breakfast, a variety of pastries, delicious coffee. I can‚Äôt ask for more. Def our go to lounge!
Love the noodle bar! Very attentive staff, clean facilities. Best lounge in T3 of Heathrow for OneWorld members.
Outstanding lounge with a well stocked noodle/dim sum bar. The service was very quick while I was there. Did not feel crowded even though busy.
Lounge has great view for all aviation lovers. Great selection of food and drinks. Showers equipped with Aesop stuff (üòç) but it was a bit dirty. It was almost empty and WIFI worked well. üëçüèº
Fresh dim sum. Well stocked bar. Loads of seats of different varieties. Calm but atmospheric. A nice buzz. Staff friendly and efficient. Excellent lounge.
Amazing lounge, particularly for an outstation. Gave me a similar vibe to The Pier business in HKG, but with a little more wow factor.
Best lounge in Heathrow so far! Great facilities!
This remains Heathrow‚Äôs best oneworld lounge. Truly top notch food and extremely comfortable.
If this is considered a bad lounge, I don‚Äôt want to be right. The noodle bar is amazing. All the seating options are great. And, would I ever complain about free Mo√´t? No, I wouldn‚Äôt.
Amazing lounge, probably the best one in T3. Without a doubt would come here again.
Hi everyone reading this review, please go to the BA or AA lounges, stay away from this one as it is too good to be shared with too many people!
Comfortable and stylish lounge - definitely the best there is in terminal 3. Do try the made to order wonton noodle soup in the noodle bar, and enjoy a glass of Mo√´t champagne from the bar.
This lounge is a secret gem. A terrific alternative to BA Galleries. We were 3 hours here, food excellent, extremely comfortable seating and virtually to ourselves. You will not be disappointed!
Wow, it‚Äôs alway a pleasure to go to a Cathay lounge, the food, the tea, the Moet, everything is perfect. Not as good as the one in Hong Kong, but still way above local airline lounge.
As OW Emerald, I got to sample this beautiful warm decorated lounge by Cathay Pacific, great shower, dining room.
Beautiful, spacious lounge in line with CX's lounge revamps. Noodle bar, hot buffet, and selection of cheeses. Beer and wine available. Very cozy.
The new lounge is fantastic. Made to order noodle bar, Moet fix and tons of elegant space to work or relax. Best OW lounge at T3.
Impressive lounge. Great food and noodle bar. Super large, clean and quite. Moet champagne. The place at T3. Oh and power everywhere.
Such a nice change from BA Galleries. Thumbs up to the noodle bar and attentive servers. Space is sleek, modern and comfortable. My new go-to at LHR.
It was a pleasure! I'll definitely come back again.
Beautiful, relaxed and calm vibe. Comfy chairs as far as the eye can see, a varied food selection and stunning 5 star shower suites. My go to lounge in T3 from now on!

location.terminalDirections: Departure Level, after Duty Free, Lounge Area H
Exit to the right after the Terminal 3 Customs Hall, take the stairs or lift to Level 2.

otherLounges.name: American Airlines International First Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: After Passport Control, exit Duty Free Area and turn right toward Lounge Area H.
Zone F, located along the corridor leading to Gates 13-22.
Zone F, located along the corridor leading to Gates 13-22
Lounge C in the Central Concourse, near Gate 11.
Located near Gate 9, lounge is signposted as "Lounge D" on the right hand side.
Follow the signs to 'Lounge F' towards Gates 13-22, proceed up one level via the lift or stairs.

The Lounge is in Terminal 3 Area A. After you go through security, follow Flight Connection route Area A,  access point in the main shopping and dining area to Level 2 accessible by taking the elevators.
Zone E, Level 1, along corridor with Gates 1-11
Zone B, located in the Central Concourse, near Gate 11, next to the Cathay Pacific Lounge.
Located in the Upper Class Wing.
5 minute walk from customs, just off the Arrivals Hall
